lead_paragraph: Kevin Magnussen suffered nothing more than a sore ankle in a massive crash in Sunday’s Belgian Grand Prix and expects to be fit to compete in the next race in Italy.    The Dane lost control of his Renault as he crested the fast uphill sweep of the Eau Rouge corner and slammed violently into the barriers.

headline.print_headline: Magnussen Escapes Serious Injury in Heavy Crash
headline.main: Magnussen Escapes Serious Injury in Heavy Crash
